OOC: Heh this Zero and Zeni Conversation is reminding me off a 
brother and sister in another BWRPG... Their the son and Daughter of 
Zarak and their names begin with Z's.

Zero turned to Zeni once again.

Zero: "She had fired upon me and the child, she needed to be subdued 
for her own safety and ours."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Zeni: Why did you want to hurt Virgo?
> 
> Zeni asked confused. If Virgo was doing something like that, then 
she was the bad one, but Zero had turned around and fired back, 
making him just as bad. (Zeni's just weird like that, alright?)
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, June 19, 2001 7:43 PM
>   Subject: Re: To Zero
> 
> 
>   Zero looks to Zeni. 
> 
>   Zero: "No... I meant to blast the one that was firing on me and 
Trinity..."
